akn:subsection.akn:heading: Officers and Employees of the Department of the Interior.—
Federal Investigative Jurisdiction and State Civil and Criminal Jurisdiction Not Preempted.—

akn:content.akn:p: (c) This section and sections 100101(b), 100502, 100507, 100751(b), 100754, 100901(b) and (c), 100906(a) and (d), 101302(b)(1) and (c) to (e), 101306, 101702(b) and (c), 101901, 102102, and 102702 of this title shall not be construed or applied to limit or restrict the investigative jurisdiction of any Federal law enforcement agency other than the Service, and nothing shall be construed or applied to affect any right of a State or political subdivision of a State to exercise civil and criminal jurisdiction within the System.
